title: Hour of Code: Hello Programming!
description: December 7, 2018 - In celebration of Computer Science Education Week 2018, MCL-ACM held the ‘Hello Programming! Coding Made Easy, Starts with an #HourofCode’. This event was held to help non-ICT Senior Highschool students understand basic programming using Google Blockly.
summary: In celebration of Computer Science Education Week 2018, MCL-ACM held the ‘Hello Programming! Coding Made Easy, Starts with an #HourofCode’.
